front.title: LDP Extensions for Optimized MAC Address Withdrawal in H-VPLS

abstract.t: [RFC4762] describes a mechanism to remove or unlearn MAC addresses that have been dynamically learned in a VPLS Instance for faster convergence on topology change. The procedure also removes the MAC addresses in the VPLS that does not require relearning due to such topology change. This document defines an extension to MAC Address Withdrawal procedure with empty MAC List [RFC4762], which enables a Provider Edge(PE) device to remove only the MAC addresses that needs to be relearned. Conventions used in this document In examples, "C:" and "S:" indicate lines sent by the client and server respectively.
